trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around July 27th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsOut back sitting with family and friends,looking up saw a meteor at same time saw a bird like objest with wongs higher than an airplanes height, move northwest in a non specific pattern, not straight, object was glowing red disappeared over neighbors house. Once I spotted it I told everyone to look and they saw it too. I was shocked and so was everyone else because it frightened me. It was not anything I could explain ever seeing.
Summary: Glowing bird like object very high
